definition: to circle/to go back/to turn around/to answer/to return/to revolve/Hui ethnic group (Chinese Muslims)/time/classifier for acts of a play/section or chapter (of a classic book)

sentences.english: The family home has been foreclosed.
sentences.chinese: 她家的房子丧失了抵押赎回权。

sentences.english: Moses therefore took the money of them that were above, and whom they had redeemed from the Levites.
sentences.chinese: 梅瑟就为那超过肋未人数而应赎回的人，征收了赎金。

sentences.english: Congmin offers money to retrieve the incriminatory evidence. Hongyuan quotes a price of 50million dollars.
sentences.chinese: 聪敏有求用钱赎回他的犯罪证据，宏远索价五千万。

sentences.english: Eventually he saved enough money working at this trade on the side to buy his freedom.
sentences.chinese: 后来他终于靠这门手艺攒够钱赎回了自由。

sentences.english: They redeemed the necklace they had pawned.
sentences.chinese: 他们赎回了典当的项链。
他们赎回了被绑架的孩子。

sentences.english: Residents remitting outward funds to redeem his global depository receipts.
sentences.chinese: 居民为赎回其海外存托凭证所汇出之资金。

sentences.english: He was able to redeem his watch from the pawnshop.
sentences.chinese: 他得以从当铺赎回他的表。

sentences.english: Continue to work with the faith that unearned suffering is redemptive.
sentences.chinese: 继续用信心工作不劳而获的苦楚是赎回的。

sentences.english: The court condemned the husband to redeem the mortage promptly.
sentences.chinese: 法庭判决该丈夫应迅速赎回抵押品。

sentences.english: A home in foreclosure, and done.
sentences.chinese: 一个家在取消抵押品赎回权，它而成。

sentences.english: Et passim , who recite the history of Israel's redemption from Egypt and other enemies.
sentences.chinese: 谁背诵以色列历史上的赎回来自埃及和其他敌人。

sentences.english: A bank foreclosed on his biggest house.
sentences.chinese: 银行取消了他最大的一个房子的赎回权。

sentences.english: He's probably pawned it till next pay day.
sentences.chinese: 他也许把他当掉了，到下次发薪日再把它赎回来。

sentences.english: Ali and high shan together to redeem the house property card.
sentences.chinese: 艾莉和高珊珊一同去赎回了房产证。

sentences.english: This fee type is set primarily to discourage short-term investors.
sentences.chinese: 设立赎回费首要目的在于阻止投资者短线炒卖。

definition: security (property held against a loan)/mortgaged property
to ask to buy/to bid for purchase
to provide (an asset) as security for a loan/to put up collateral
